name: The Bank Thief Free
description: You play as a professional bank robber called Bob Ace who has been locked up for years in a filthy prison cell for various bank and diamond heists. But the prison time is over and now you are about to dust off your old skills and continue in the footsteps of your infamous father. Become a professional bank robber. Hack into bank computer systems to steal money from closely guarded safes. Disable various security systems in banks, eliminate guards and diverse obstacles operating on locations by your cunning mind. Show that you can do it. Remember there is a time limit in which you have to perform the theft otherwise an alarm is triggered. Enjoy this free game.
